item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Juri Strumpflohner, a years old software developer. Currently I work as a software architect and frontend developer at R3-GIS, here in beautiful South Tyrol (Italy) where my main tasks are on the frontend, doing JavaScript, TypeScript, AngularJS and Angular.

item.title: Newsletter
item.description: Hey ðŸ‘‹ Yes, I decided to launch a newsletter. Why? It’s an experiment I’d like to try. As a Google Developers Expert, software engineer and freelance trainer, I’m continously learning new things.

item.title: Public Speaking
item.description: Here are some of my public speaking events. SFSCon Bolzano (November 2018) - “End-to-end testing done right!” Angular San Francisco Meetup (November 2018) - “Boost your Reactive Angular Forms” ngTalks 2018 (August 2018) - “Supercharge your Angular forms!

item.title: Workshop: Angular Fundamentals
item.description: This is a beginner level workshop, introducing the participants to developing modern web applications with Angular. Topics Some of the covered topics are the following:
